name: Action Creator for Nirvana
description: The 'Action Creator for Nirvana' addon for Firefox lets you add new actions to your inbox of Nirvana for GTDÂ® (nirvanahq.com) without opening the web-client. If you enter your email and password ,the Nirvana API it used. Otherwise - or when you typed wrong credentials - the functionality to create actions via mail is used. Therefore you need to enter the nirvana inbox mail. The addon is not affiliated with or created by Nirvana.
